game.name: Fallen Sin
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A fast-paced hack and slash game featuring endless wave-based combat. Cut down hordes of relentless monsters as they grow stronger and more numerous with each passing wave. Master your combat abilities, chain devastating combos, and adapt your strategy to survive increasingly brutal encounters.
